title.narrative: Improved Governance and Accountability for Education in the Democratic Republic of Congo

description.narrative: This activity (Improved Governance and Accountability for Education in the Democratic Republic of Congo) is a component of UKAID-USAID ACCELERE! Improving access, quality and governance of primary education in the Democratic Republic of Congo. reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £20,537,380. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Primary education. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 06-10-2014 and the end date is 31-12-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2017 Quarter 3
